title: Error in malloc while running with thread sanitizer

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: A-sanitizers
labels.description: Area: Sanitizers for correctness and code quality.

body:
I tried this code: ```rust #[cfg(test)] mod tests { #[test] fn it_works() { assert_eq!(2 + 2, 4); } } ``` Then I ran ```RUSTFLAGS="-Z sanitizer=thread" cargo +nightly test --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -j 8 --lib``` I expected to see this happen : the test should pass Instead, this happened: ```shell RUSTFLAGS="-Z sanitizer=thread" cargo +nightly test --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -j 8 --lib Compiling temp v0.1.0 (/mnt/d/r/code/FUN/AoC/temp) Finished test [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 3.29s Running target/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/debug/deps/temp-095a78e43e82b177 running 1 test test tests::it_works ... ok ================== WARNING: ThreadSanitizer: data race (pid=2280) Write of size 8 at 0x7b4000008000 by main thread: #0 free /rustc/llvm/src/llvm-project/compiler-rt/lib/tsan/rtl/tsan_interceptors_posix.cpp:708:3 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x1bcc8) #1 alloc::alloc::dealloc::h49222860122f83cb /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/alloc/src/alloc.rs:104:14 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #2 _$LT$alloc..alloc..Global$u20$as$u20$core..alloc..AllocRef$GT$::dealloc::hd011bebbc5d2215c /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/alloc/src/alloc.rs:239:22 (tem p-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #3 alloc::alloc::box_free::hb71a745404480769 /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/alloc/src/alloc.rs:334:9 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #4 core::ptr::drop_in_place::hc04477b996b712f4 /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/core/src/ptr/mod.rs:179:1 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #5 _$LT$std..sync..mpsc..mpsc_queue..Queue$LT$T$GT$$u20$as$u20$core..ops..drop..Drop$GT$::drop::h91d8518b384ead20 /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/std/src/sy nc/mpsc/mpsc_queue.rs:112:57 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #6 core::ptr::drop_in_place::h9650e8c8039b88dc /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/core/src/ptr/mod.rs:179:1 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #7 core::ptr::drop_in_place::h51cb6d3d33fea70a /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/core/src/ptr/mod.rs:179:1 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x9047f) #8 core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once::h5a9930e2447997e9 /home/ubuntu/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ops/function.rs: 227:5 (temp-095a78e43e82b177+0x89ab1) #9 std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::h24f3df1126ff3b49 measured; 0 filtered out ThreadSanitizer: reported 1 warnings error: test failed, to rerun pass '--lib' ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` ubuntu@DESKTOP-RPC48A3:/mnt/d/r/code/FUN/AoC/temp$ rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.50.0-nightly (1c389ffef 2020-11-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673 commit-date: 2020-11-24 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
